pullRequest.body:
Also move some lift lemmas to be next to their non-lift counterparts.

For now this does not generalize to `ι : Sort v` as this would make a mess with `PLift`.

---

nodes.body: 🚀 Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by alreadydone.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7306921577/job/19912106009)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7306921577/job/19912105905)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7306921577/job/19912105966)

Does this behave any differently from `lift_id'`? I think (in Lean 4) you need to explicitly specify the universes to rewrite with either of them, no matter what the order of the universe arguments is.
Good catch, I must have tricked myself into thinking I needed this. Removed.

i.e., I think this works
```suggestion
  rw [← lift_sum, lift_id'.{u,v}]
```

```suggestion
    lift.{v} #(⋃ x ∈ s, A x) ≤ lift.{u} #s * ⨆ x : s, lift.{v} #(A x.1) := by
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(SetTheory/Cardinal/Basic): add missing `lift` versions of `iUnion` lemmas
